text: Manilkara longifolia, commonly known as masseranduba, is a species of plant in the family Sapotaceae. It is endemic to Brazil, where it is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==External links== * Picture: wood, cross section, as Mimusops longifolia from the Economic Botany Collection of Richard Spruce longifolia Category:Plants described in 1844 Category:Endangered plants Category:Flora of Brazil Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Manilkara longifolia
